div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Dear Andrew Community Families, We hope that everyone is making the most of this trying time and you are able to find some joy each day. We have been so thankful for all of the staff and...
Parents and Guardians,We are going to start accepting Preschool Registration Papers starting tomorrow (4/13/2020) at 7:30 AM. However, due to COVID-19, we will not be accepting the papers in...
Hello Andrew School Families,This week we are transitioning into a new approach to teaching and learning as we launch our Voluntary Distance Learning Plan. This plan will include new lessons and...

Attention Andrew Middle School students: The Three R’s will be hosting a Middle School Zoom session Friday, April 24, at 1pm. Check the ACSD Google Classroom for the link!
We hope to see you there :) - Ruden, Rockwell & Riedesel

We are restarting the meal program starting Monday, April 27th. If interested please go to: https://forms.gle/FA78yiAdLZ6ceP649 to fill out the new form. We are starting with some hot meals and meals to warm up, so it's important to get an accurate count to minimize waste.

Hi Andrew families and friends!
We wanted to send a reminder about our Andrew Staff Parade tomorrow, April 23rd at 5pm! We are starting at the school and will be driving around Andrew, and then the Andrew area countryside. We are only able to drive some streets so please see the routes in the pictures attached to make sure you see us! Families are welcome to find a spot on the route in town or outside of town if we are not passing your house, but please remember to keep distance from others. Both the town route and countryside route are attached. We can’t wait to see you! view image
